mapper.select:
select cid, sell_mid, buy_mid, pid, chat_content, to_char(cdate,'mm.dd hh:mm') cdate, chk_read from banana_chat
order by cdate desc

select cp.cid, cp.buy_mid, cp.sell_mid, cp.pid, cp.chat_content, cp.cdate, cp.chk_read, cp.mid, cp.ptitle, cp.pprice, cp.psfile, m.score, m.maddr, m.nickname from (select c.cid, c.buy_mid, c.sell_mid, c.pid, c.chat_content, c.cdate, c.chk_read, p.mid, p.ptitle, p.pprice,p.psfile from (select cid, buy_mid, sell_mid, pid, chat_content, cdate, chk_read from banana_chat where cid=#{cid}) c , banana_product p where c.pid = p.PID) cp , banana_member m where cp.buy_mid = m.mid
